yeast.name: Instant Yeast
yeast.notes: Add directly to the dry ingredients.

yeast.name: Active Dry Yeast
yeast.notes: Dissolve in warm water before mixing into the dough.

inclusions.name: Cranberries
inclusions.notes: Soak in warm water before adding to prevent drying out the dough.

inclusions.name: Sunflower Seeds
inclusions.notes: Can be used as a topping or mixed into the dough.

making: Mix all ingredients together until combined.
If using inclusions, add them during the second stretch and fold.
Let the dough rise at room temperature for 4 hours.
Shape the dough and place it in a proofing basket.
storage: Store the bread in a paper bag at room temperature for up to 2 days.
For longer storage, wrap tightly in plastic or foil and freeze for up to 1 month.
reheating: To refresh, heat in an oven at 180째C (350째F) for 10-15 minutes.
For slices, toast in a toaster or under a broiler until warmed.
usage: Best served with butter or olive oil as a side to soups and salads.
Makes excellent sandwiches, especially for grilled cheese or paninis.
Use stale bread for croutons, breadcrumbs, or bread pudding.
